short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change the background and font colors of ChatGPT instantly and save preferences.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adjust ChatGPT's theme for eye comfort, inclusivity, and personal style. Make ChatGPT work for you and your eyes. The ChatGPT Theme Controller extension offers a simple solution for users sensitive to high contrast web pages. With just a few clicks, you can adjust the font brightness and background colors of the ChatGPT interface to reduce eye strain and make reading more comfortable, especially in low-light environments or for extended periods.

Features:

1- Font Brightness Control: Lighten or darken the text to find the perfect contrast for your eyes.
2- Background Customization: Choose a background color that eases your reading without the harsh contrast.
3- Easy-to-Use: A user-friendly interface allows for quick adjustments with immediate effect.
4- Persistent Settings: Your preferences are saved and applied automatically each time you visit ChatGPT.
5- Accessibility Focused: Designed to enhance readability for users with light sensitivity or visual impairments.

Start enjoying a more comfortable chat experience with ChatGPT today!
